scripts.clean: rm -rf static/dist && mkdir -p static/dist/js && mkdir -p static/dist/css && mkdir -p static/dist/images
scripts.build:js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -t envify -t vueify -o static/dist/js/site.js static/src/js/index.js
scripts.optimize: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run optimize:js && npm run optimize:css"
scripts.watch:js: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -t envify -t vueify static/src/js/index.js -o 'exorcist static/dist/js/site.js.map > static/dist/js/site.js' -dv
scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:js" "npm run build:css" "npm run copy:images"
scripts.watch: concurrently --raw "npm run watch:lint" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css"
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others --raw "./manage.py runserver" "npm run watch" "npm run dev:browser-sync"
scripts.compile: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run clean && concurrently \"npm run copy:images\" \"npm run build:js\" \"npm run build:css\""
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run compile && npm run optimize
